website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, space-saving model that doesn't offer much shelf or storage space.
pros: Slim design doesn't take up much space
Ideal for small rooms and apartments
cons: Instructions are confusing and finding correct placement for the pieces can be challenging

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about putting my 65' tv but it feels really sturdy, good purchase 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about 2 months exactly what I expected, I was worried about putting my 65' tv but it feels really sturdy, good purchase 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Savage serg

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, was able to mount the sound bar on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy, was able to mount the sound bar on the stand just under the TV. only complaints was I removed a sticker on the black shelf and it peeled the surface off
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good wooden tv stand, somewhat easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Managed to build it within an hour and 15 mins. One of the steps in the manual was way harder than necessary, but everything else was easy enough. You do need some common sense when building it, and if you have that then you should be able to build it. The build doesn't seem super sturdy after making it, but its holding up just fine for now. Will edit this if it does break. Another thing is that there are no extra screws/parts, so don't lose any of it! It came with the screws for my TCL 65 in 6 series tv which I was very happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The stand is nice but not strong enough to support a 55 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissatisfied with this stand. At first I thought the screws were missing that mounted the tv. This was not the case. The screws are not for a big tv and the description says it should hold a 55 inch tv. The stand is nice but not strong enough to support a 55 inch tv not to mention the screws don’t fit either. I am stuck with the tv stand because I don’t have a box to send it back with. I had to open the box in a way that the box Cohen not be saved. Please don’t buy this if your tv is 55”. I lost a lot of money now. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: L'homme russe

customer_reviews.title: Wasted 8 hours of build to find out it was poorly constructed, and could not hold 70 inch TV
customer_reviews.text: Just don't buy it! you're playing "did I get a safe product" roulette. After spending well over 8 hours buildng, we noticed two of the holes where the product needs most support were not done properly. We tried our best to relign as per the instructions and put the TV on. We watched as the supporting beam starting to come undone despite our meticulous work in completing build. Had we not been around, our 70 inch tv would sure have fallen and killed our cats. Now it's fully constructed, unusable. Wasted an entire day building. I want my money back! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Em Em

customer_reviews.title: Partical board, need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: This was no fun putting together. Usually I do ok with picture instructions but some of the pictures were pretty hard to follow. The grab bolts came loose after tightened several times. The wood is that crap partical board which is really only worth half of what the price is. The drill holes for the drawers were poor the screws kept wanting to go in sideways. The rubber feet came undone because they are only screwed in. Very cheap for not a cheap price tag. I am disgusted at what is considered furniture these days, why is the standard low and the price high? Partical board material is not worth the cost people.
customer_reviews.author: mafiaboy

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I needed a night to sleep off the frustration & disappointment. 1) You need at least two people for assembly. 2) Wood/paint is cheap & some chipped off with barely any force. 3) Directions could have been more clear. 5) The drawers were a nightmare and did not assemble flush. Had to make new holes. make sure drawer rails are all screwed in the same way. 4) Extremely time consuming. It took me 7 hours to assemble w/ two people. 5) The tv mount is non tilt/swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This would have been the perfect stand but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this stand to work out, it was exactly what I needed for my family room. The quality was good and the color and size were perfect. However, some of the pieces were defective. There were no holes where there should have been, I received duplicate pieces that did not align. Unfortunately, I had to return it, which was another annoying process. If you've ever assembled a piece of furniture about 60-70% and had to dismantle and repackage it, you exactly what I mean. I can't say that I would recommend, due to the defective pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money....not even a little!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest made product! Literally toon 2 people almost 10 hours to put together and many of the screws blew out the cheap as hell composite board its made of. The mounting bracket is barely held on, had to purchase additional hardware to ensure our TV will be held in place. Would highly recommend purchasing a different one I could have spent a 1/4th of the money getting a similar one from the family dollar or walmart but was hoping if I spent more online it would be better quality, we were wrong. Also came in with several chips and damage to the cheap composite board and cheap vinyl covering. Save yourself the headache and buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually very disappointed in this product. I went against the bad reviews and purchased this tv stand and I'm very upset with it. Quite a few pieces are scratched and chipped. Holes were drilled where the shouldn't be and then the holes u need are drilled in enough. Instructions are not very clear to put it together. If I could send it back I would but it's too heavy. Paid over $100 dollars for something to look like that is very upsetting..
customer_reviews.author: C. Lujan

customer_reviews.title: DONT!
customer_reviews.text: Never in life have I experienced such a difficult to put together piece of horribly made crap. I have to order something else I don't trust it to hold up my tv. Like it's poorly made...and I'm scared I just bought this tv. Im mad I wasted time putting it together. I wouldn't even give this to anybody. So many issues with the wood and the screws. I've bruised my legs putting this bs together. Whoever made the instructions had to be on a mission to mind screw us all. Good day!
customer_reviews.author: ebony2013

customer_reviews.title: You need lots of patience
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a one star because it took me 2 week to kinda finish it. We followed the I structuring carfully but not even that helped. We used other material and nothing seem to hold the wood. It's very complicated and we never go to see the finish because we was afraid to ruin the wood and not get our refund back. This night had just happen to us and might not to you but I have to se be ready for a huge headache and hope you have lots of patience.
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to receive this product but it was overall disapointment. To start off, the UPS delivery put the product on a different apartment number. The assembling instructions were a bit horrible. And look at the pictures, the lower left hole to put the screw for the tv mount is not right and the mount itself is not even after i was done assembling it. It'll be a whole lot of effort to disassemble this to do a return. I feel like i want a full refund on this crap!
customer_reviews.author: Vee Cee Gee

customer_reviews.title: 🥰Definitely Worth The Time👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT ! Shipping was Super Fast 🥰 literally 1wk from date of purchase. Once opened, all components were there, well packed, in tact with No Damages, cracks or uneven wood tones etc. . . Everything was just as described and when all set up, performed AMAZINGLY! Sturdy & Durable with no wobbling at all. The only issue with the stand was it is very time consuming for someone with no experience putting things like stands together, but we did it I helped and learned a lot and Absolutely Love it ! 🥰 I'm pleasantly surprised with the outcome and will definitely order more from this seller in the future👍🏿 Seller Recommended 5⭐'sThanks & Blessings🌷
customer_reviews.author: Regina Garner

customer_reviews.title: Plan a whole day to put together
customer_reviews.text: THe quality of the product was horrible. It came with scratches on the panels and was the hardest thing to assemble. It was an all day project and that is not exaggerated. It is to much work to send back so unfortunately I will just deal with it bt will not be buying anymore Ameriwood products.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Olson

customer_reviews.title: This is a LEGO set Puzzle. That Works for the Price. Work Involved.
customer_reviews.text: Guys Im overall Happy with the Purchase but the Instructions are Horrible. There are Tons of Pieces and screws/parts so Be ready to get organized Like 28 different Bags of Parts. Dont Rush or you Will Crack the Wood And Pay Attention the Pieces Might Look The Same at first but front and back Hole Patterns are DIFFERENT. For the Price It is a Super Deal if you have Patience and Time. For the Angry and Quick Tempered People Stay Away.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Gil

customer_reviews.title: Looks simple but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with several pieces broken but my husband didn’t think it would affect the functionality of it so he assembled it anyway. Had a drawer that had broken pieces(didn’t realize this until the whole thing was already set up) and the main board in the back had lots of chips but again, it didn’t look too bad. Reached out to manufacture and received replacement part free of charge which was great but that meant more time spent on assembling as my husband needed to disassemble to replace the broken pieces with the new pieces. All in all it was a great purchase, even with the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap compared to the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the image appeared to be much bigger. As you can see in the photo my old cheap $99 stand is much better. Also, it says needs to be up against the wall, no where did it say it could not be in the corner. I would not trust anymore than a 42" on this stand. What a waste of 2 hours putting it together. Ended up selling to neighbor for $50 and I feel I ripped him off.
customer_reviews.author: jbdaiello

customer_reviews.title: Not bad,could be better.
customer_reviews.text: First order had 3 parts missing,called Mfg.for parts and was told to send back as parts were not available.Amazon sent return shipping and shipped another quickly.All the parts were included with 2nd package but 2 parts were not pre drilled and had to do so myself.Instructions were pretty straight forward and took about 40 minutes to complete once I drilled holes.I did have my 11 year old daughter help as a 2nd set of hands are helpful for a few steps.Not a bad stand but wasn't very happy about sending first package back and getting another not completely ready to assemble.For the price it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: A pain to put together, but altogether a nice stand
customer_reviews.text: I'd add a photo, but my camera won't focus. Anyway, putting this thing together was pretty frustrating. The instructions were a bit confusing, but we were able to figure it out. Once we had it put together and successfully mounted our tv it's actually a really nice stand! Super easy to move around, everything held together wonderfully, and has a perfect amount of space on the shelves. I also have to note that we have an older Insignia 63" flatscreen, so it's on the heavier side compared to anything newer, and this stand is holding it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME
customer_reviews.text: I've spent more than 4 hours trying to assemble this over priced JUNK! I'm good with assembly but this thing is a nightmare and not worth the money! I've ran out of patience and refuse to wait for replacement pieces or even re-assemble this. The holes are not lined up and it's cheap "wood" you can see every little scratch no matter how careful /gentle you are putting it together.... This TV stand has a great look and concept but I wouldn't pay more than $70 for this but considering that I can't even use it it's WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.author: Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Set of Parts - Assembly Impossible
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped with an incomplete set of parts, making assembly impossible. Instead of having parts A - M (as listed in the assembly instructions), I'm missing SEVERAL panel pieces (E, H, and M). Product came in a box that was beaten up and warped, too, and once opened, everything inside was jumbled together and pieces were scratched. The whole set feels more like someone took apart their old tv stand and (after losing a couple of parts) tried to shove everything back into its original box, stored it in their garage, and then listed the re-packaged product as "new." Not at all what I expect from an Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste ur money.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, mines broke because the tv was to much weight but it said that it can hold up to 60 inch tv and my tv was only 40inch and yet it broke after 52 days not even 2 months but my refund or return policy expired after 45 days of purchase and at the time I was working so much i could call Amazon M-F and wknds u would just sleep most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Nice minimalist stand for an uncluttered look
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of this stand a lot. It is sturdily built, with a very minimalist look. It works well in our living room. My only reason for not giving this 5 stars is the surprise on the last page of the assembly instructions. On that last page it states "Warning. Risk of death or serious injury. This unit must be placed against a fixe in place wall at least as tall as television." I'm sure this is an appropriate safety warning. However, it was not our intention to have the unit against a wall. It would have been nice to know this restriction before purchasing the stand.
customer_reviews.author: jleejapan

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is fantastic! Super heavy and you will not have a worry in the world once your TV is up there. I have seen a bottom clip on some TV stands and this one does not have that, but if you've got a 65" TV on there it's not going to budge. Couple of fumble ups in the assemble process but got it right eventually. The pieces are so large and awkward I would suggest at least 2 people. I tried it alone the first night and ended up having help come by the next day. it make putting it together a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: WannabeAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: My product was damaged up in the packing department. All taped up and product is all beat up and scratched. We have missing parts and a set of mattress instructions on how to put the tv stand together not helpful at all. Very disappointed. Plus to send it back cost more then the product was worth.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: You might have better luck...
customer_reviews.text: Assembling this stand is not a fun project. It took about an hour and many of the screws did not easily fit into the pre-drilled holes. The screws were such poor quality than many of them got stripped. The 32" Hisense T.V. that we tried mounting did not fit right out of the box. I had to drill some holes in the bars (I blame this more on Hisense then Altra but mention for those purchasing this stand for a Hisense T.V.). I like that this stand is compact and doesn't take up much room. It's also pretty solid and sturdy. But I hate that fact that the t.v. is still too low.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: It’s very sturdy. It’s short but I knew that when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I put a couple of pieces together backwards and I’m afraid to take it apart so I just ordered some more black screw cover stickers so I can cover the screws. It’s very sturdy. It’s short but I knew that when I ordered it. I just didn’t realize how short. My 50” is very secure though. It’s a nice sturdy stand. I purchased a “like new” stand from amazon warehouse. It looks brand new to me. For the price, I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: IneedAmazonRehab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Setup
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv stand. It takes alot of work to assemble, but the final product is AMAZING!!! It's beautiful and my 70 inch fits perfectly. Only issue was the tv bracket that screws into the tv didn't have all the holes I needed to attach it to my tv. Luckily my neighbor had a drill i could borrow to add a few holes to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Z.

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV stand
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is solid. I like it a lot and it has nice storage for whatever you need it. DVDs, games, magazines, etc. What I do recommend make sure your tv is a flat one not curved like mines. I managed to install it but it was unstable and I was afraid my $3k will fall and crack since it’s glass. So I took it down from the racks and just set it on the top shelf. It worked just fine. The stand really wasn’t made to hold curve TVs securely. So make sure your TV is the right size and flat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rico

customer_reviews.title: Quality T.V Stand - 65"
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV stand up with my 65" TV mounted for a few weeks and it's seemingly a great quality stand for the low price. It's not going to wow you with it's looks but again, this isn't an expensive product. Not too sure what the negative feedback on the assembly is all about. This is going to take you at least an hour to assemble solo and I do recommend you get some help for certain parts but it's by no means necessary. If you've assembled furniture in the past and demonstrate patience, you'll get this put together without too many problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous function for the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 'used like new'. Box was pretty well dinged up but all pieces and parts were there and nothing was damaged. Instructions are pictographic and very clear but some of the pre-drilled holes aren't deep enough and it took more than a little muscle and some power tools to finally pull it all together. Now that it's together, I'm quite happy with the stand and I think it looks fabulous in our living room. Exactly as pictured and exceeds my expectations for functionality and perceived durability (for the price, I was concerned it would be flimsier but it feels quite sturdy, even with the TV mounted).
customer_reviews.author: Rhela

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small, great construction.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is kinda low to the ground for my taste, which isnt a dealbreaker for me its a little bit smaller than i anticipated but it holds up my 65 inch T.V with no problem at all. Very stable construction. Will update with pictures later. Picture of this stand supporting my 65"
customer_reviews.author: DiY-er

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy this JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Do not buy this stand! Nothing lines up correctly! Drawers are a joke! And quality is worth about $10.00!! Instructions that are clear would be nice to have as well!! This product. Needs to go back to the drawing board with another designer and the original one FIRED!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice but It Took alot of Patience & Time to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The final assembled product looks very nice and brings out the beauty of having a big screen TV! However, you need patience, time, and some logical thinking to assemble and figure out the pictured instructions. Otherwise, just Google with any confusing part (e.g. CAM lock) since the TV stand comes in individual boards & metal parts! Our arrow stickers was reversed when we tried to assemble the 2 drawers.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: This stand is so affordable and saves you a ton of space when you don’t have a lot of square footage to work with. It also presents you with an easy way to have a mounted tv affect w/o putting holes in your wall. However, you definitely get what you pay for, the pieces are cheap plywood, and the paint literally comes off if you even look at it. It works for us in the small guest room of our starter home, but it probably won’t be coming with us to our next home.
customer_reviews.author: Shauneil Snell

customer_reviews.title: Streamline look and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece. Very sturdy for my 50" tv, PS4 and speakers. I love this set up b/c it is uncluttered and fits perfectly in my limited tv space. Not the easiest piece I have ever put together but if you take your time and read the instructions carefully you can get it done. I did it by myself. Would definitely recommend this tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Originally wanted to mount my tv on the wall but the studs were too far apart to use the wall mount kit. I purchased this stand as an alternative. All items were properly marked to conduct a good inventory. Instructions for this manufacturer are all photos, pretty easy to follow. A couple of steps seemed a bit out of order as far as accessing the screws, but nothing major. Ideal for corners. Total assembly with 42" tv mounted comes to my neck (I'm 5'7"). Glass shelf is sturdy enough after simple installation for Verizon Fios Cable box, newer thinner DVD player and XBox 360 console. You can easily hide the cables behind the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only just received this product, so I can't speak to its longevity. However, I was very impressed with the apparent quality of the product, even as I was taking it out of the box. The materials used seem to be much more sturdy than I'm used to with this type of furniture (pressboard). Plenty of room for a stereo, speakers, gaming systems etc. The center tower has great cable-management potential & I was able to set everything up without a single cable showing & without using any extra hardware to accomplish that. Would buy again. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible instructions and some of the holes were not drilled on the right places. Because of getting frustrated and having to stop this took us 3 days to put together. There were at least 3 different times we had to undo many steps to fix something that we did wrong because the directions were so unclear.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha King

customer_reviews.title: Attractive TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I got this model. First, the one with drawers looked good but shelves are so much more convenient. It fits my 50" TV just fine and is at the right height. It looks better in the room than online. My friend who is an appliance repairman put it together in 45 minutes. Watching him, I strongly recommend you use a power screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Lleogn Longhair

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid MINUS broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and idea of this product- however the hex screwdriver that was included to screw in the base broke during setup. When tightening the screw down on the base with the included tool, the hex screwdriver snapped and scratched the crap out of my hand. I now will have to purchase the tool for this, which was expected to be included with purchase. Will update review
customer_reviews.author: Floridadude

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Price is good. Assembly is the hardest thing I've ever tried. I had 1 screw with no head in it. Everything that said don't over tighten I feel was oversized it took 3 of us trying to get them seated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most tedious piece of furniture that I have ever put together. So many unnecessary small parts that don’t always fit together correctly. Made super cheap. Took me about 5 hours to put together because the threads on the screws wouldn’t screw into the small holders that they make you use. Drawers don’t fit correctly because the holes did not line up right, etc. super unhappy with this purchase and wish I could get a refund because at this point I don’t even want it. What a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gardner

customer_reviews.title: It is not a good design for hiding cables or structurally sound in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is "engineered lumber" which is PC for pressed sawdust and glue covered in vinyl. It is not a good design for hiding cables or structurally sound in the way the tower attaches to the base. Be sure you want to mount your expensive $1000 TV on $60 worth of vinyl covered saw dust. I should have known better, but was looking for a 'cheap' temporary stand. I got exactly what I paid for... I added an earthquake strap to the back of the stand and attached to the wall not because I'm afraid of an earthquake, but because a large truck rumbling by could cause catastrophic failure of where the tower attaches to the plywood base..
customer_reviews.author: JLawson

customer_reviews.title: Wood bang
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and intact. One corner was slightly scuffed but not noticeable and I'll probably be able to get it out. Some people said the instructions are unclear; they're not. If you pay attention and organize everything prior to starting it won't take long at all. You do have to be careful of the cam locks, as too much force will crack them. Even tho it's partical board it feels sturdy and solid. I put my 50 pound 65 inch Vizio in it and so far it hasn't collapsed. 10/10 wood bang.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even have for a month before it came tumbling down! Lost my tv because of this stand ...not worth the buy... Too much work to put together! Not impossible to put together ... Easy instructions just alot of work
customer_reviews.author: Zamber

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product and quality. Very complicated instructions and one of the 2 panels came broken. The quality is terrible. I decided to throw the whole thing away because I didn't realize that one of the panels was damaged before I began the assembly process. I do not recommed buying this TV stand
customer_reviews.author: fernando solares

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered as a warehouse deal which I have done with several items. Usually the items that I get are still great this item however it looks like it could be great. But inside the Box almost all of the support pieces have tape on them that is causing the laminate to peel off with it one of the small support pieces is broken and has been tried to be glued back together and one of the larger support pieces is completely broken. There was also no instruction manual and it is going to be a pain to send back I'm super disappointed because it is exactly what I wanted if it was actually not busted
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, and small yet awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the display and I'm pleased with it. Has enough bolts and screws to ensure it won't topple or lean where the wood seems quite sturdy. Note: Be advised of the dimensions as I did not. It's rather short when you think of tv mounting and instructions can throw you if not handy minded. I think if it had one more tier, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Ortan

customer_reviews.title: Built much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I honestly expected fiberboard. What I got was a few non-structural pieces of fiberboard, the rest was 9/16" & 11/16" MDF. This thing is sturdy and heavy. Very impressive at this price range. My only complaint was that some of the fiberboard pieces were not quite milled correctly. They were close to 3/16" off in places. Not enough to prevent assembly, but it still looks a bit sloppy, to me, as a result. With a TV mounted and the shelves filled, nobody will ever know but me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving all of these low star ratings because I can only go based off of looks. None of the hardware came with the package. No instruction booklet, no bolts to put it together, no metal brackets for the tv mount or drawers. This is very frustrating. Not to mention the box is so old, it is literally falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Devon T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the five stars, more than we expected for the price. It is very nice the quality is great. The sturdiness is wonderful we have a 55-inch Vizio it definitely could have supported a bigger TV. The compressed fake wood is well manicured and looks real. My husband wanted to make sure that I put in parentheses or exclamation marks that it is a P.I.T.A to put together . I disagree if you build both the top and base attach to A then proceed it was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple to install IF you follow instructions unlike some other purchasers
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions and use common sense, one would understand that particle board is great to use IFF you don't over tighten the screws. It holds together and feels extremely solid. Was very easy to setup and easy to mount the TV. My only complaint is that there should be some kind of lock in place for the mount so it cannot slide back and forth when pushed. However, TVs generally are not touch displays so once it's up, no one should be touching it anyway. Only had it up for a week. Will update my review if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheap and defective. I received this item and it has missing parts, broken parts, and the shelving was scratched in different areas!!!! When we tried to assemble it, the holes didn't match up at all. It was very flimsy and I was worried after on'y getting 1/2 of it done that it wouldn't be strong enough to hold me TV
customer_reviews.author: UNHAPPY CUSTOMER, PA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to raise your A/V aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before deciding to buy this. My biggest fear was the packaging and if the stand succumbed to any maladies while in transit. It was packed perfectly, as good as or even better than IKEA stuff. Directions were clear and hardware was correct. Everything was labeled, so as long as you follow the directions, it comes together beautifully. I bought this because I was so happy with the smaller model I have in my Den (last pic). Solid, sturdy and sleek, even with my 60lb 65” TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Not as hard as people make it seem! Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stand. Arrived perfect with no shipping issues or damage. Organized all the pieces, and slowly put it together. It took time, but it was straight forward. Normally I'm awful at putting things together and have to go back and fix my mistakes, but none here. The only issue I had was the mounting attachments didn't have a M8 45mm length, but thats to be expected as few tv's need them (my Samsung curved did, so a trip to Home Depot solved that). This stand meets all of my needs and looks great while holding my 65" tv, center channel speaker, XBox One X, Wii, Home Theater Receiver, movies and games and accessories in the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Berman

customer_reviews.title: Not 5 stars, simply because of the poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is exactly as pictured. The color is a nice dark black and it is holding my 65 in flat screen. I was worried it wouldn't seem secure, but it is honestly very secure. The drawers were the whole reason I favored this stand. The drawers work well, but the instructions were clear when it was time to build them so it took longer to get it put together and put together correctly so that the drawers were usable and flush.
customer_reviews.author: A_Hall

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a handy person do not buy this. Get ready to strip almost all the screws. The instructions are clear but can be easily messed up. I am very handy and it took me 3 hours to put this together. Scratches easy and dings easy as well so you have to be careful putting this together. Otherwise it looks pretty nice once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are worse than useless; they have no words, only poorly drawn diagrams that show a few of the wrong instructions. I was missing one piece (a side of one of the bottom drawers. There should have been 2 labeled "O" according to the instructions, I only recieved 1). The wood is poor quality. And some of the stickers that label what piece is what for the instructions were just loose in the box, not on the piece. This is about to be a $150 worth of firewood for my son to roast s'mores. And the package weighs nearly, if not over, 100lbs so returning it is even more ridiculous. lesson learned I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Public Name Goes Here

customer_reviews.title: Parts and Service are useless
customer_reviews.text: This turned up missing some parts ...ok that happens ....rang and their reps told me that new ones would be on the way but they can't do overnight...ok cancel the dish installer and organize him for a few days later...parts arrived and I got ready to start the assembly...wrong parts delivered again .....rang them and told them I had installers coming to fit the new TV ....can't do overnight ....two day was promised ...checked the tracking number and it won't be here for about 4 days ...if it's right....this was cheap and the service we got shows that....but assembled and locally if you can ..you'll have your TV up and running weeks before you will with these clowns
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very tedious; not sturdy hardware. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: First of all wow this is a lot of parts!! Decent instructions. They don't get as specific as they should... However was damaged slightly during shipping. Also missing a piece. While finishing assembly, and mounting tv, stand collapsed (shelf C came off, screws broke/pulled out) and tv fell and broke. Contacting company for replacements, will update review accordingly based on their customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, sturdy and attractive but if you're not both patient and handy this could prove to be a little much. Product was delivered in one large box, shipping was quick. The box is heavy. It took my husband a few hours to put together. It makes a nice addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small,  stil works
customer_reviews.text: Says it fits 30-50". I bought for my 50". It's working, but it looks tiny in comparison. The picture on the website must have a 30" tv on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A narrow stand like this could cause problems if you don't install correctly
customer_reviews.text: Be careful to install exactly as the instructions say and make sure everything is tight. A narrow stand like this could cause problems if you don't install correctly. But If you do, it's a great stand. Looks really sharp. Hold my 50" Panasonic perfectly. Takes up way less space than other stands. I would definitely recommend! Definitely don't try anything above 50". As you can see in my pic, my 50 is ALMOST too big, but still looks great. A 55 or above though? Don't try it. Trust the manufacturer...50 is the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile for it to become because of the shipping company. Amazon tried their best but the shipper wasn't good. I love this product but two things I must say is that the glass piece doesn't seem completely stable. I feel like the design could of been better. If you're trusting your devices to sit on it or below it, you want to feel safe. But it doesn't give you that security. Also the glass is black. It's not clear. Which is really upsetting because the picture advertise that it's clear. But even after all that I got a great price for it. So you get a great product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Don"t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend . I received it today and the stand was all chipped and was missing vertical brackets. I called manufacturer and they said it would take up to two weeks. So I improvised and bought a tv mount at Walmart and made it work. Very disappointed it would take 2 weeks when I wasn't the one who messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Good Sturdy product. I love that you can raise and lower the t.v. I have our 65" on this and have it low for extra sturdiness. My son has many gaming consoles and remotes and there is plenty of space without looking cluttered. Nice looking piece of furniture. If you are on a budget as he was then this is highly recommended for you! F.Y.I. Make sure when you are putting together you have all the seems pulled together tight to add sturdiness. Also, you want to have a second person to make it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbye

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was a snap
customer_reviews.text: Took a little more than half and hour from unboxing to setting the TV in place. No special tools. Couldn't be easier unless it came pre-assembled. Plenty sturdy. Don't think I would want kids crawling all over it, but it wasn't built as a jungle-gym. Base is broad and stable. All in all, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Parts Missing Couldn't finish assembly
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed is the least I can say. I was almost finished with assembly when I realized 4 of the screws were miasing and I couldn't put bottom shelf on . During this Covid-19 I don't know when i will get replacement pieces. Bombed. Now i have this stand half done sitting in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Moe D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this stand so I am giving it 3 stars. However, the instructions that came with it were horrible. No written directions, just pictures. And the pictures were not always clear enough to tell which way to turn the piece. I am fairly savvy when it comes to assembling furniture but it took me and my husband nearly 5 hours to actually get it all assembled and the tv mounted. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Lover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow directions putting it together. Looks great and my old 55” LG Plasma Screen fit no problems and although heavy by todays standards, still under the weight limit of the stand. It supports it fantastic and really does look good. Another thing that is a huge thing to me is it moves easily on the floor. My old unit would not move at all. This is a thing because our dogs are always loosing toys behind or on the old unit under and I’d have to move it to clean it out.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wilson Briney Jr

customer_reviews.title: This stand looks great in the media room
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks great in the media room, with a 65 inch OLED mounted. It seems rock solid, although I do have it against a wall, as advised. This thing does take a while to put together, so plan on spending 3-6 hours with it. Instructions aren't terrible, and if you have IKEA like experience you should be fine. Only minor complaint was that the mounting screws didn't fit my TV. However, at the price I can't expect them to include every possible variation.
customer_reviews.author: ListerD

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Shipped promptly. Delivered without damage. Holding our 60" TV. I know that sounds silly, but have had some stands that did NOT securely hold big tv's!. Enough storage for the xBox and PS4 plus stereo surround-sound receiver. Highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. KEMPF

customer_reviews.title: 4 year update!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this about 4 years ago and I am still using them. if you want something simple to have your tv up. this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Yoon

customer_reviews.title: It is very difficult to put together it is very time consuming
customer_reviews.text: I will not advise anyone to get a TV stand that was most difficult is this one it was a all day thing to put together if .I could’ve shipped it back .I would have that’s why I’m giving it three stars it looks nice on the picture but it don’t seem like it will hold up for a 75 inch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd one
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love this product. I had two previously and bought this one for my parents living room flat screen tv. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: H.F.F

customer_reviews.title: Very upset
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift may 20th for Father’s Day and when he went to put it together not only was it missing pieces but it was split in areas where the wood are and couldn’t be fixed I really want a new one sent out or a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little stand for a large tv
customer_reviews.text: I like how its compact yet able to support a larger tv, it was easy to put together and looks good in the living room
customer_reviews.author: Sam mc gee

customer_reviews.title: Good look for the price
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried because the box it came in looked pretty beat up on one corner. But everything was in good condition and no damage after all. Putting it together took awhile even with 2 people. At the end it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: B. E.

customer_reviews.title: Getsthe job done, but be prepared to spend some time assembling it.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is okay, it holds well my 70" and 60 lb TV and feels sturdy enough. The finish is not the best, but it is good value for the price. The biggest downside is how demanding is to assemble this product. In fairness it does say it requires two people; and while I am not an expert I consider myself reasonably competent and it still took me about 4 hours to get it done. The instruction manual is not the best, and I found some inaccuracies in their directions, but it is definitely doable.
customer_reviews.author: JTC

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this used!! It is worth the money to buy it brand new because I am missing parts and the instructions were torn up when I received it. The styrofoam used to pack my item was shredded as well like if a mouse got ahold of it which is now all over my livingroom. The screws were all thrown in the box not even nicely packed. I am so mad!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: 👎
customer_reviews.text: The holes don't line up and not enough holes and to holes to big
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Set aside several hours for assembly...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews for this kind of stuff, but it took me nearly 7 hours to assemble it. The instructions are awful. Unfortunately, it’s made up of mostly hex screws that are hard to turn in the tight spaces where you have to put them. The rubber feet on the bottom pull off if you slide the stand in anyway. On a positive note, I do have a 70” TV mounted to it and it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hall

customer_reviews.title: not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: They sent it without instructions. We had to go through different websites to find the instruction manual. There was some slight damage to some of the metal pieces. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Edwood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort. But it is kinda nice
customer_reviews.text: There are 18 different types of hardware for assembly. Well over 100 pieces. Almost impossible to do by your self. Instructions are not completely clear. Doesn't seem sturdy. Particle board gets damp easy. I've been an auto tech for 15 years. I can completely disassemble and reassemble any almost anything. This was a little bit of a task for me
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand.
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself. Wish the directions were more clearer but I figured it out. The mount that holds the tv mount could be more sturdy so I got some screws and screwed the top part so it would hold the tv mount and tv. Made it more tight & solid.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Souza

customer_reviews.title: Assembled stand had it for about a week and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembled stand had it for about a week and it broke, which in turn broke my brand new 43" tv. Amazon sent us a new stand but we are still out of luck for the cost of the tv and not really interested in keeping a stand that didn't work originally.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the hardest to put together the holes dont line up and the instructions make no sense. Wish I never purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: joseph anders

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This thing was junk right out of the box. Broken pieces no instructions, and metal parts that break when you try to install them! Total garbage/waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Horton

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice stand but does take a couple hours to put together. My husband put this together and he was even surprised at how long it takes. Some steps are a little awkward to do and again time consuming but overall is a nice stand. My only fault is the way it holds the TV. It is attached to the holder but is held only by sliding brackets which i don't care for but that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AmyF

customer_reviews.title: Do not over tighten the screws
customer_reviews.text: Great stand was easy to Assemble in the beginning toward the last steps was a bit hard for me but i put it together in 2 hours might be different for others but i still manage to put it together it’s sturdy i would recommend placing it in-front of a wall
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany white

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a pain to build.
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 of us 3 hrs to put this together. The directions could have been better. The bottom drawers did not get out together right so we aren't using them. Very sturdy though. Once it is put together it is very nice. Our 65in tv looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Seiber

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the bars on the top and sides
customer_reviews.text: I have a 26" TV that does fill up the holder. The tops of the bars peek over it like "bunny ears," which drives some people crazy, although I honestly don't notice it at all. The stand is ideal for a larger television, 35" or more - only because it will hide the sides and tops of the bars that stabilize it. But the piece itself is thin and does not take up much room, which was important to me. The base does come out a little further than I would have preferred, given the narrow depth of my living room, but other than that I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: age2603

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace my family room cabinet tv stand. The product is very sturdy, and has a nice espresso finish. The assembly was an issue. The instructions do not go step by step systematically. There are some parts that you just have to have builder's intuition or think about how the end result should look. Also a good note to know is you will have extra parts. Tv mount bolts come in all different shapes and sizes and are not universal, therefore ameriwood includes a couple different kinds.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great design but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Decent to build. Not very solid. You could probably destroy it with one solid kick
customer_reviews.author: Logan Connors

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great Works Even Better!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. Wonderfully engineered, strong & stable. Artistic in design and not to hard to assemble. HINT: if you use a power drill to drive the screws, set the clutch to about 3 or less because it's easy to over torque the camlock posts (I messed up the first one, but had a spare part in my collection of misc parts). Other than that, this is very well designed. All key parts are made from heavy duty, powder coated steel. I would purchase this again if I got another big screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wall mounted like look without actually wall mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basic TV Stand for those of us that would prefer not to wall mount, but want the next best thing. Does the job well, the slide rail allowing repositioning of the TV Panel is a nice touch. Wish it could tilt to an extent, but you can't get everything. Good choice overall though, does a great job with my 42" LG LCD.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Putting Together a TV Stand for Dummies
customer_reviews.text: I just put it together as best as I could. I'm not handy at all and the directions dont come with words, only pictures. Its holding up my 40 inch TV right now pretty well. It is unstable so if there's too close of thunder it might fall but hopefully not. Good stand. No complaints on day 1.
customer_reviews.author: i_beautifulrose

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy!
customer_reviews.text: The glass shelf on my unit is unlevel as a result, I am unable to secure with the screw. Good concept poor mishaps by the technicians. Reminder... Keep the box unit has been completely built.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Galaxy TV Stand with Mount for TVs up to 50", Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:50-In. TV Stand| Color:BlackEven the smallest of spaces can use an Ameriwood Home Galaxy TV Stand with Mount. Measuring in at a mere 49.0625"h x 29.5"w x 23.625"d, this unit is compact, but the mount can hold a 50” flat-screen television with a maximum weight of 70 lbs. Because of its small size, it’s great for apartments, family rooms, bedrooms, dorms and any other space that can utilize vertical storage. The floating shelf design features 2 fixed shelves, with 1 of them made of glass. Additionally, 2 cubbies along the spine of the stand are ideal for organizing DVDs and games. With a sleek black finish, this laminated MDF and particleboard TV stand boasts a modern style. Two people are required for proper assembly.
feature_bullets: Take advantage of small spaces by adding the Ameriwood Home Galaxy TV Stand to your living room, family room or dorm
Two fixed shelves and 2 storage cubbies make electronic organization simple. Clean and Care - Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly
Two people are required for proper assembly. Dimensions: 49.0625"h x 29.5"w x 23.625"d. Shipping weight is approximately 38.59 lbs
The smooth black finish is accentuated by the glass shelf
This unit was constructed from laminated MDF and particleboard with a metal mount and tempered glass shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,834 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.
